item.title: J.J. add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Everything you can imagine is real." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: J.J. add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: J.J. add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "To say "I love you" one must know first how to say the "I"." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: J.J. add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "A lie gets halfway around the world before the truth has a chance to get its pants on." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: J.J. add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description:
"He has all the virtues I dislike and none of the vices I admire."
<a href="http://www.winston-churchill-leadership.com/churchill-quote-others.html">[On British Labour politician Stafford Cripps.]</a>" -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: J.J. add a quote by Winston Churchhill
item.description: "We make a living by what we get. We make a life by what we give." -- Winston Churchhill

item.title: J.J. add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Healthy citizens are the greatest asset any country can have." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: J.J. add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "We contend that for a nation to try to tax itself into prosperity is like a man standing in a bucket and trying to lift himself up by the handle." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: J.J. add a quote by Winston Churchill
item.description: "A politician needs the ability to foretell what is going to happen tomorrow, next week, next month, and next year. And to have the ability afterwards to explain why it didn't happen." -- Winston Churchill

item.title: J.J. add a quote by صادق هدایت / Sadegh Hedayat
item.description: "در همین جهان است که دست کم می توانی امیدوار باشی که روزی کلک خودت را بکنی، امیدی که در آن جهان نمی تواند وجود داشته باشد." -- صادق هدایت / Sadegh Hedayat

item.title: J.J. add a quote by صادق هدایت
item.description: "هرچه قضاوت دیگران درباره من سخت بوده باشد نمیدانند که من بیشتر خودم را سخت قضاوت کرده ام" -- صادق هدایت

item.title: J.J. add a quote by marquis de sade
item.description: "Either kill me or take me as I am, because I'll be damned if I ever change." -- marquis de sade

item.title: J.J. add a quote by Derek Walcott
item.description: "The time will come when, with elation, you will greet yourself arriving at your own door, in your own mirror, and each will smile at the other’s welcome." -- Derek Walcott

item.title: J.J. add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: J.J. add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I wish it need not have happened in my time," said Frodo. "So do I," said Gandalf, "and so do all who live to see such times. But that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: J.J. add a quote by الإمام الحسين عليه السلام
item.description: "خط الموت على ولد آدم مخط القلادة على جيد الفتاة، وما أولهني إلى أسلافي اشتياق يعقوب إلى يوسف، وخير لي مصرع أنا لاقيه، كأني بأوصالي تقطعها عُسلان الفلوات بين النواويس وكربلا، فيملأن مني أكراشاً جوفاً وأجربة سغباً، لا محيص عن يوم خط بالقلم، رضى الله رضانا أهل البيت، نصبر على بلائه ويوفينا أجر الصابرين، لن تشذ عن رسول الله لحمته، و هي مجموعة له في حظيرة القدس تقرّ بهم عينه وينجز بهم وعده" -- الإمام الحسين عليه السلام

item.title: J.J. add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: J.J. add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: J.J. add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: J.J. add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "And Lot's wife, of course, was told not to look back where all those people and their homes had been. But she did look back, and I love her for that, because it was so human. So she was turned into a pillar of salt. So it goes." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: J.J. add a quote by سیمین دانشور
item.description: "ترجمه ها همچون زنانند. آنها که وفادارند کمتر زیبایند و آنها که زیبایند کمتر وفادار" -- سیمین دانشور

item.title: J.J. add a quote by Franz Kafka
item.description: "A book must be the axe for the frozen sea within us." -- Franz Kafka

item.title: J.J. add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Live to the point of tears." -- Albert Camus

item.title: J.J. add a quote by A. A. Milne
item.description: "Well," said Pooh, "what I like best," and then he had to stop and think. Because although Eating Honey was a very good thing to do, there was a moment just before you began to eat it which was better than when you were, but he didn't know what it was called." -- A. A. Milne

item.title: J.J. add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: J.J. add a quote by رضا قاسمی / Reza Ghasemi
item.description: "وقتی زبان مادری‌ات فقط 127 فعل داشته باشد که مستقیم صرف می‌شوند، وقتی هزاران فعل دیگر را باید به کمک فعل معین صرف کرد، و این فعل هم درست همان فعلی باشد که برای عمل هم‌خوابگی به‌کار می‌رود، آن‌وقت زبان خیانتکار می‌شود." -- رضا قاسمی / Reza Ghasemi

item.title: J.J. add a quote by آزاده طاهايي / Azadeh Tahaei
item.description:
"آدم‌ها می‌آیند زندگی می‌کنند می‌میرند و می‌روند اما فاجعه‌ی زندگی تو آن هنگام آغاز می‌شود که آدمی می‌ميرد اما نمی‌رود می‌ماند و نبودنش در بودن تو چنان ته ‌نشین می‌شود که تو می‌میری در حالی که زنده­‌ای و او زنده می‌شود در حالی که مرده است
از مزار که بازگشتی قبرستان را به خانه نیاور" -- آزاده طاهايي / Azadeh Tahaei

item.title: J.J. add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: J.J. add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: J.J. add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "I was set free, because my greatest fear had already been realized, and I was still alive, and I still had a daughter whom I adored, and I had an old typewriter and a big idea. And so rock bottom became the solid foundation on which I rebuilt my life." -- J.K. Rowling
